name: Peruse
description: A simple plaform for creating highly readable single-page client-side online books.

scripts.build: set -e -o pipefail; rm build/*; browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react ] ] peruse.js | uglifyjs > build/peruse.js; cp peruse.css build/; cp icons/* build/
